attributes.action: Dismantle TFL and the office of the mayor of London
attributes.additional_details:
TFL and the mayors office are proving again and again that they are unfit to look after London.
Salaries are extremely excessive.
Cycle lanes are being forced on us that are nearly always empty.
Government must take back control now until a new Mayor can be elected after the pandemic has eased.
attributes.background: Take back control of London and remove those at the top of TFL from office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TFL is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You could start a new petition asking for a referendum about ending devolution to London and returning devolved powers to the UK Government, if that's something that you'd like to see.  

If you want a referendum in London on removing the role of the Mayor, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334242
